message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SD 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it focuses on language modeling techniques to improve speech recognition. Additionally, the use of recurrent neural networks and convolutional neural networks also suggests a focus on natural language processing. 

It could also belong to cs.SD (Sound) as it deals with acoustic modeling techniques for speech recognition. 

cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another likely sub-category as the paper discusses the use of deep learning techniques for both acoustic and language modeling. 

cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also a possibility as the paper discusses the use of advanced machine learning techniques to improve speech recognition. 

Finally, cs.SD (Signal Processing) is a possible sub-category as the paper deals with processing audio signals for speech recognition.
